channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This Blood Thinner Is More Effective Than Aspirin at Preventing Heart Attacks
item.description: Aspirin is commonly prescribed to patients with coronary artery disease to prevent heart attacks and strokes, but a new analysis has found that anothe...

item.title: LegalZoom Promo Codes and Deals: 20% Off Services
item.description: Save on top services at LegalZoom, like LLC registration, incorporation, estate plans, and more with coupons and deals from WIRED.

item.title: Paramount Plus Coupon Codes and Deals: Up to 50% Off
item.description: Save on streaming with the latest Paramount+ promo codes and deals, including 50% off subscriptions, free trials, and more.

item.title: Madrid’s Orbital Paradigm aims to prove a cheaper path to orbital reentry
item.description: Orbital Paradigm is moving fast and cheap to industrialize low Earth orbit.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S11 Series and Galaxy S25 FE: Specs, Features, Price
item.description: The company unpacked two new flagship Android tablets at IFA 2025, alongside a fifth entry in the Galaxy S25 series.

item.title: Scale AI is suing a former employee and rival Mercor, alleging they tried to steal its biggest customers
item.description: Scale is clearly concerned enough about the threat of Mercor, and the poaching of one of its employees, to pursue legal action.

item.title: Apple’s Siri upgrade could reportedly be powered by Google Gemini
item.description: An AI Siri is in the works and it could be running Gemini under the hood.
